# Installation Instructions.

- Install [R](https://www.r-project.org/)

- Open R or in RStudio, install the R package `devtools` via the command `install.packages('devtools')`

- Install the application via `remotes::install_github('qiushiyan/openpolicing')` (this may take some time)

- Run `openpolicing::run_app()` to start the application locally
